title: I need to know the precise date of a patch.

embed.description: Important note on 3rd party apps! Due to some of the changes made this patch, using 3rd party applications has a higher risk of crashing your game. If your game is crashing, please try updating or uninstalling any applications you use alongside League of Legends. Now back to our regularly scheduled patch note programming...

body:
I need to know the date of this particular patch. It says 3 years ago but in addition i want to know how many estimated months it was ago. I hope someone or maybe a rioter can help me.


-WowSuchDoge
{{champion:64}}

Update: I seem to have found the estimated month which is october. I still dont know the date though.

replies.body: In the future try the league of legends wiki. They have the full patch history.

That might be the most specific question I've ever seen in my time here! 

As far as I can tell from digging, it looks like patch 3.12 was released about Oct 1, 2013.
